channel.title: Voice logs
channel.description:
It's kind of like a video log, but it's just me talking about random things. I'm doing it to practice in public speaking. Its really helping me, I'm actually seeing results in my speech where I actually don't stutter a lot which has been a problem because I was raised with my Asian side of the family most of the time.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ap5hdTaXhHU
Give me some comments on what I can possibly improve on as far as speech, subjects to talk about, remembering what I'm talking about. Everything that can help me improve. Would love some feedback. I won't post the first two because you can find those easily. I'm not too concerned on if you understand what I'm talking about because it's mainly aimed at my friends for laughs.

item.title: Voice logs
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

LilXCj:

I’m doing it to practice in public speaking. Its really helping me, I’m actually seeing results in my speech where I actually don’t stutter a lot which has been a problem because I was raised with my Asian side of the family most of the time.

You can’t read… can you?

item.title: Voice logs
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

I don’t see the point of this, you sound like your doing your daily good time activity and talking about poop. What are you trying to achieve from this?

item.title: Voice logs
item.dc:creator: @Mack_n_cheese Mack n cheese
item.description:
@Mack_n_cheese wrote:

you’re boring.

get rid of the monotone voice, and show some personality.
